content: Hey Mathilde Collin! Thanks for your comment :D I do totally agree, and I recognized when writing this that there are definitely exceptions. If you’re a consumer-focused mobile app, for example, you’ll definitely want to build advanced analytics more aggressively. These recommendations are the mostly tailored for SaaS and ecommerce businesses, although hopefully there are plenty of lessons for others as well, just with a bit of timeline-shifting. Thanks again — great stuff.
